section.title: Milestone 1 Music
section.p: Currently there are no people working on music and soundeffects for SuperTux, so if you are any good add doing them, feel welcome. We need around five songs for SuperTux:

ul.li: additional short music snipes for game-over, end-of-level, etc.

section.title: Milestone 1 Soundeffects
section.p: Milestone1 also needs sound effects, something like a few 'clicks' when moving around in the menu, stuff for game-over, for kicking and jumping on enemies and such.
